heartstone

Interface Card

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCard, Assassin, Druid, Healer, Hunter, Knight, Mage, Paladin, Shaman, Warlock

    public interface Card
    Card is an interface with the methods that will be implemented in the AbstractCard abstract class.
    Since:
    1.0.
    Author:
    Daniel Araya.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void attack(Card card) 
      void attackedByAssassin(double attack)
      increases the damage counter of a Card by the Assassin's attack value.
      void attackedByDruid(double attack)
      increases the damage counter of a Card by half of the Druid's attack value and increases the Card's attack by the Druid's attack value.
      void attackedByHealer(double attack)
      restores the damage counter of a Card by half of the Healer's attack value, if the Card is dead, this action does not occurs.
      void attackedByHunter(double attack)
      increases the damage counter of a Card by the Hunter's attack value.
      void attackedByKnight(double attack)
      increases the damage counter of a Card by the Knight's attack value.
      void attackedByMage(double attack)
      increases the damage counter of a Card by the Mage's attack value.
      void attackedByPaladin(double attack)
      restores the damage counter of a Card by a third of the Paladin's attack value and increases the Card's attack by the same third of the Paladin's attack value.
      void attackedByShaman(double attack)
      increases the damage counter of a Card by a third of the Shaman's attack value and diminishes the Card's attack by the same third of the Shaman's attack value.
      void attackedByWarlock(double attack)
      increases the damage counter of a Card by the Warlock's attack value.
      double getAttack() 
      double getDamage() 
      double getLife() 
      java.lang.String getName() 
      boolean isDead()
      checks if the Card has received more damage than its life points, in which case it is dead.
      void kill()
      Equalizes the damage counter of a Card with its life points.

    • Method Detail

      • getDamage

        double getDamage()
        Returns:
        Card's damage counter's value.

      • getAttack

        double getAttack()
        Returns:
        Card's attack.

      • getLife

        double getLife()
        Returns:
        Card's life points.

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Returns:
        Card's name.

      • attack

        void attack(Card card)
        Parameters:
        card - Card to attack.

      • attackedByAssassin

        void attackedByAssassin(double attack)
        increases the damage counter of a Card by the Assassin's attack value.
        Parameters:
        attack - Assassin's attack attribute.

      • attackedByDruid

        void attackedByDruid(double attack)
        increases the damage counter of a Card by half of the Druid's attack value and increases the Card's attack by the Druid's attack value.
        Parameters:
        attack - Druid's attack attribute.

      • attackedByHealer

        void attackedByHealer(double attack)
        restores the damage counter of a Card by half of the Healer's attack value, if the Card is dead, this action does not occurs. Damage counter cannot be negative.
        Parameters:
        attack - Healer's attack attribute.

      • attackedByHunter

        void attackedByHunter(double attack)
        increases the damage counter of a Card by the Hunter's attack value.
        Parameters:
        attack - Hunter's attack attribute.

      • attackedByKnight

        void attackedByKnight(double attack)
        increases the damage counter of a Card by the Knight's attack value.
        Parameters:
        attack - Knight's attack attribute.

      • attackedByMage

        void attackedByMage(double attack)
        increases the damage counter of a Card by the Mage's attack value.
        Parameters:
        attack - Mage's attack attribute.

      • attackedByPaladin

        void attackedByPaladin(double attack)
        restores the damage counter of a Card by a third of the Paladin's attack value and increases the Card's attack by the same third of the Paladin's attack value. Damage counter cannot result to be negative.
        Parameters:
        attack - Paladin's attack attribute.

      • attackedByShaman

        void attackedByShaman(double attack)
        increases the damage counter of a Card by a third of the Shaman's attack value and diminishes the Card's attack by the same third of the Shaman's attack value. Card's attack cannot result to be negative.
        Parameters:
        attack - Shaman's attack attribute.

      • attackedByWarlock

        void attackedByWarlock(double attack)
        increases the damage counter of a Card by the Warlock's attack value.
        Parameters:
        attack - Warlock's attack attribute.

      • isDead

        boolean isDead()
        checks if the Card has received more damage than its life points, in which case it is dead.
        Returns:
        true if the damage counter is greater than life points. false otherwise.

      • kill

        void kill()
        Equalizes the damage counter of a Card with its life points. The existence of this method is only to be implemented in the tests and make them more readable .
        See Also:
        AbstractCard.damageCounter, AbstractCard.lifePoints
